results.title: Mechanisms underlying antiatherosclerotic properties of an enriched fraction obtained from Ilex paraguariensis A. St.-Hil.
results.text_hl: Then, during 8 experimental weeks, @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ received diet supplemented with 1% @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_120970</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:120970 @@@CRD@@@). After 4 weeks of CDR, animals were redistributed into five groups (n = 6) and treated (p.o.) with n-BFIP (10, 30 and 100 mg/kg), @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (5 mg/kg), or vehicle (filtered water, 1 ml/kg) once daily for 4 weeks.

citations.NLM: Santiago PG, Gasparotto FM, Gebara KS, Bacha FB, Lívero FADR, Strapazon MA, Junior ELC, Kassuya CAL, de Souza LM, Gasparotto Junior A. Mechanisms underlying antiatherosclerotic properties of an enriched fraction obtained from Ilex paraguariensis A. St.-Hil. Phytomedicine. 2017 Oct 15;34():162-170. PMID: 28899499
